verses.verse: There were present <WG3918> at <WG1722> that season <WG2540> some <WG5100> that told <WG518> him of the Galilaeans, <WG1057> whose <WG3739> blood <WG129> Pilate <WG4091> had mingled <WG3396> with their sacrifices. <WG2378>

And Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> said <WG2036> to them, Suppose <WG1380> you that these <WG3778> Galilaeans <WG1057> were sinners <WG268> above <WG3844> all <WG3956> the Galilaeans, <WG1057> because <WG3754> they suffered <WG3958> such <WG5108> things?
I tell <WG3004> you, No: <WG3780> but, except <WG3362> you repent, <WG3340> you shall all <WG3956> likewise <WG5615> perish. <WG622>

Or <WG2228> those <WG1565> eighteen, <WG1176> <WG2532> <WG3638> on whom <WG3739> the tower <WG4444> in Siloam <WG4611> fell, <WG4098> and slew <WG615> them, think <WG1380> you that they were sinners <WG3781> above <WG3844> all <WG3956> men <WG444> that dwelled <WG2730> in Jerusalem? <WG2419>
I tell <WG3004> you, No: <WG3780> but, except <WG3362> you repent, <WG3340> you shall all <WG3956> likewise <WG3668> perish. <WG622>

He spoke <WG3004> also <WG1161> this <WG5026> parable; <WG3850> A certain <WG5100> man had <WG2192> a fig <WG4808> tree <WG4808> planted <WG5452> in his vineyard; <WG290> and he came <WG2064> and sought <WG2212> fruit <WG2590> thereon, <WG1722> <WG846> and found <WG2147> none. <WG3756>

Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> he to the dresser <WG289> of his vineyard, <WG289> Behold, <WG2400> these three <WG5140> years <WG2094> I come <WG2064> seeking <WG2212> fruit <WG2590> on <WG1722> this <WG5026> fig <WG4808> tree, <WG4808> and find <WG2147> none: <WG3756> cut <WG1581> it down; <WG1581> why <WG2444> encumbers <WG2673> it the ground? <WG1093>

And he answering <WG611> said <WG3004> to him, Lord, <WG2962> let <WG863> it alone <WG863> this <WG5124> year <WG2094> also, <WG2532> till <WG2193> I shall dig <WG4626> about <WG4012> it, and dung <WG906> <WG2874> it:
And if <WG2579> it bear <WG4160> fruit, <WG2590> well: and if <WG1487> not, then after <WG1519> <WG3195> that you shall cut <WG1581> it down. <WG1581>
And he was teaching <WG1321> in one <WG3391> of the synagogues <WG4864> on <WG1722> the sabbath. <WG4521>

And, behold, <WG2400> there was a woman <WG1135> which had <WG2192> a spirit <WG4151> of infirmity <WG769> eighteen <WG1176> years, <WG2094> and was bowed <WG4794> together, <WG4794> and could <WG1410> in no <WG3361> wise <WG3588> <WG3838> lift <WG352> up herself.
And when Jesus <WG2424> saw <WG1492> her, he called <WG4377> her to him, and said <WG2036> to her, Woman, <WG1135> you are loosed <WG630> from your <WG4675> infirmity. <WG769>
And he laid <WG2007> his hands <WG5495> on <WG2007> her: and immediately <WG3916> she was made <WG461> straight, <WG461> and glorified <WG1392> God. <WG2316>

And the ruler <WG752> of the synagogue <WG752> answered <WG611> with indignation, <WG23> because <WG3754> that Jesus <WG2424> had healed <WG2323> on the sabbath <WG4521> day, and said <WG3004> to the people, <WG3793> There are six <WG1803> days <WG2250> in which <WG3739> men ought <WG1163> to work: <WG2038> in them therefore <WG3767> come <WG2064> and be healed, <WG2323> and not on the sabbath <WG4521> day. <WG2250>

The Lord <WG2962> then <WG3767> answered <WG611> him, and said, <WG2036> You hypocrite, <WG5273> does not each <WG1538> one of you on the sabbath <WG4521> loose <WG3089> his ox <WG1016> or <WG2228> his ass <WG3688> from the stall, <WG5336> and lead <WG520> him away <WG520> to watering? <WG4222>

And ought <WG1163> not this <WG5026> woman, <WG1135> being <WG5607> a daughter <WG2364> of Abraham, <WG11> whom <WG3739> Satan <WG4567> has bound, <WG1210> see, <WG2400> these eighteen <WG1176> years, <WG2094> be loosed <WG3089> from this <WG5127> bond <WG1199> on the sabbath <WG4521> day? <WG2250>

And when he had said <WG3004> these <WG5023> things, all <WG3956> his adversaries <WG480> were ashamed: <WG2617> and all <WG3956> the people <WG3793> rejoiced <WG5463> for all <WG3956> the glorious <WG1741> things that were done <WG1096> by him.
Then <WG1161> said <WG3004> he, To what <WG5101> is the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> like? <WG3664> and whereunto <WG5101> shall I resemble <WG3666> it?

It is like <WG3664> a grain <WG2848> of mustard <WG4615> seed, which <WG3739> a man <WG444> took, <WG2983> and cast <WG906> into <WG1519> his garden; <WG2779> and it grew, <WG837> and waxed <WG1096> a great <WG3173> tree; <WG1186> and the fowls <WG4071> of the air <WG3772> lodged <WG2681> in the branches <WG2798> of it.
And again <WG3825> he said, <WG2036> Whereunto <WG5101> shall I liken <WG3666> the kingdom <WG932> of God? <WG2316>

It is like <WG3664> leaven, <WG2219> which <WG3739> a woman <WG1135> took <WG2983> and hid <WG1470> in three <WG5140> measures <WG4568> of meal, <WG224> till <WG2193> the whole <WG3650> was leavened. <WG2220>
And he went <WG1279> through <WG2596> the cities <WG4172> and villages, <WG2968> teaching, <WG1321> and journeying <WG4197> <WG4160> toward <WG1519> Jerusalem. <WG2419>
Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> one <WG5100> to him, Lord, <WG2962> are there few <WG3641> that be saved? <WG4982> And he said <WG2036> to them,
Strive <WG75> to enter <WG1525> in at <WG1223> the strait <WG4728> gate: <WG4439> for many, <WG4183> I say <WG3004> to you, will seek <WG2212> to enter <WG1525> in, and shall not be able. <WG2480>

When once the master <WG3617> of the house <WG3617> is risen <WG1453> up, and has shut <WG608> to the door, <WG2374> and you begin <WG756> to stand <WG2476> without, <WG1854> and to knock <WG2925> at the door, <WG2374> saying, <WG3004> Lord, <WG2962> Lord, <WG2962> open <WG455> to us; and he shall answer <WG611> and say <WG2046> to you, I know <WG1492> you not from where <WG4159> you are:
Then <WG5119> shall you begin <WG756> to say, <WG3004> We have <WG2192> eaten <WG5315> and drunk <WG4095> in your presence, <WG1799> and you have taught <WG1321> in our streets. <WG4113>
But he shall say, <WG2046> I tell <WG3004> you, I know <WG1492> you not from where <WG4159> you are; depart <WG868> from me, all <WG3956> you workers <WG2040> of iniquity. <WG93>

There <WG1563> shall be weeping <WG2805> and gnashing <WG1030> of teeth, <WG3599> when <WG3752> you shall see <WG3700> Abraham, <WG11> and Isaac, <WG2464> and Jacob, <WG2384> and all <WG3956> the prophets, <WG4396> in the kingdom <WG932> of God, <WG2316> and you yourselves thrust <WG1544> out.

And they shall come <WG2240> from the east, <WG395> and from the west, <WG1424> and from the north, <WG1005> and from the south, <WG3558> and shall sit <WG347> down <WG347> in the kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>
And, behold, <WG2400> there are last <WG2078> which <WG3739> shall be first, <WG4413> and there are first <WG4413> which <WG3739> shall be last. <WG2078>

The same <WG846> day <WG2250> there came <WG4334> certain <WG5100> of the Pharisees, <WG5330> saying <WG3004> to him, Get <WG1831> you out, and depart <WG4198> hence: <WG1782> for Herod <WG2264> will <WG2309> kill <WG615> you.

And he said <WG2036> to them, Go <WG4198> you, and tell <WG2036> that fox, <WG258> Behold, <WG2400> I cast <WG1544> out devils, <WG1140> and I do <WG2005> cures <WG2392> to day <WG4594> and to morrow, <WG839> and the third <WG5154> day I shall be perfected. <WG5048>

Nevertheless <WG4133> I must <WG1163> walk <WG4198> to day, <WG4594> and to morrow, <WG839> and the day following: <WG2192> for it cannot <WG3756> <WG1735> be that a prophet <WG4396> perish <WG622> out of Jerusalem. <WG2419>

O Jerusalem, <WG2419> Jerusalem, <WG2419> which <WG3588> kill <WG615> the prophets, <WG4396> and stone <WG3036> them that are sent <WG649> to you; how <WG4212> often <WG4212> would <WG2309> I have gathered <WG1996> your children <WG5043> together, <WG1996> as a hen <WG3733> does gather her brood <WG3555> under <WG5259> her wings, <WG4420> and you would <WG2309> not!

Behold, <WG2400> your <WG5216> house <WG3624> is left <WG863> to you desolate: <WG2048> and truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, You shall not see <WG1492> me, until <WG2193> the time come <WG2240> when <WG3753> you shall say, <WG2036> Blessed <WG2127> is he that comes <WG2064> in the name <WG3686> of the Lord. <WG2962>
